data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands, Greece
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, please give the 3,692 believers in the state of Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands, Greece a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Persian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Persian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Persian people is yours.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands, Greece.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.focus_label: Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands, Greece

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands, Greece will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
